original_text: And the right thigh you shall give to the priest as a contribution from the sacrifice of your peace offerings.
korean_text: 또 너희는 그 화목제물의 오른쪽 뒷다리를 제사장에게 주어 거제를 삼을지니

sentences.original_text: And the right thigh you shall give
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 오른쪽 넓적다리는 너희가 바칠 것이며

sentences.original_text: from the sacrifice of your peace offerings
